name: KOVERED Universal Smartphone Fish Eye Lens
description:
Providing 180 degrees of ultra-wide photographic exposure, the KOVERED Fish Eye Lens is the ultimate modern smartphone accessory. 

Adding a new perspective to your shots, the KOVERED Fish Eye Lens achieves remarkable results, with wide angled panoramic portraits and intriguing depth-of-field effects bringing your portfolio to life. Finished in stylish chrome silver and rich matte black casings, the fish eye effect has never looked so good. We have carefully tried and tested multiple alternatives before selecting this premium glass model. The universal clip helps you quickly attach and detach the lens to catch the perfect moment.

The KOVERED Universal Fish Eye Lens Features -

Protective carry case 
Universal clip on attachment
Premium glass lens for superior clarity and durability

The KOVERED Fish Eye Lens is compatible with all smartphones with a 1cm or below camera lens. Please contact us if you are not sure.

name: KOVERED Maya Samsung S4 Ultrathin Case
description:
The Maya civilization sustained themselves through long periods of drought by pioneering sustainable land and water management that reserved water and protected crops in dry periods (A.D 700).

The KOVERED Maya range combines a practical design with the clean and distinctive protection of a durable wooden facing. The slim recycled matte rubber and plastic bevel ensures an instant synergy with your favourite device, whilst offering a snug grip. Bring a little bit of nature to your pocket, with the environmental gadgetry of the Maya KOVERED range.

The KOVERED Maya Range Features -

•Form-fitting snap on style holder, with ultrathin wooden face
•Engineered to securely fit  
•100% Handcrafted 
•Ultra Slim and Lightweight 
•Easy Snap on Style in Matte Rubber Interior

Naturally Different……. the natural grain of each case will differ slightly

You will also receive a FREE screen protector with this purchase. 

Postage in the UK is also FREE. Express international postage is just £4.49.

name: KOVERED Azna Ultrathin Zebrawood iPhone Case
description:
The Azna tribe of West Africa have sustained life in harsh Saharan conditions through engaging and resourcefully using natural resources and local geography to survive.

The handmade Azna Case in Zebrawood, is the perfect synergy of a natural spectacle and modern wonder. Inspired by environmental and technological passion, this durable and sustainably sourced case provides longstanding protection, whilst engaging with a stylish, unique, and practical design. Say goodbye to cheap and harmful plastics.
We have a patented ultra-thin design, which we think is pretty unique, offering superior protection.

The KOVERED Azna range features-

• Form-fitting 2 piece design  
• Engineered to perfectly fit
  • 100% Handcrafted in eco-friendly zebrawood 
• Organic product without any harmful materials  
• Ultra slim and lightweight at just 23 grams

Naturally Different……. the grain of each case will differ slightly  You will also receive a FREE screen protector with this purchase, or you can choose to opt for the tempered glass addition for a small cost.

Postage in the UK is  FREE. International postage is just £4.49.

All of our products are packaged in recyclable, toxin free cardboards.

name: Bamboo AWEI Earbuds with In-Ear Noise Isolation
description:
Our AWEI Wooden Earbuds offer the natural alternative to your favourite techcessory. Choose between bamboo or walnut, and experience noise isolation and enhanced bass features which add an understated charisma to your musical gadgetry. The soft rubber bud molds seamlessly with the contours of your inner ear, whilst expanding to ensure no loss of audio quality, whether chatting to friends or listening to your favourite tunes. Hear with the attuned perfection of mother nature.

Features include -
•	High Quality Gold Plated 3.5mm Jack
•	Adjustable Earmolds in 3 Sizes
•	Available in 2 Colours  (Bamboo and Walnut)
•	In-ear Noise Isolation 
•      Braided cable for durability and protection

Naturally Different…….Please be aware, grain may differ slightly, because nature made them!

Kovered Wooden Earbuds are compatible with all standard 3.5mm headphone jack connections.

All of our products are packaged in recyclable, toxin free cardboards.

name: KOVERED Mauri iPhone Bamboo Flip Case
description:
Mauri culture promotes the spiritual bonds between Papatuanuku (Mother Earth) and people, which provides unity and identity to sustain future generations.

Our premium Mauri range emits the bold strength and decorative allure of its namesake. Crafted with a practical fold-open design, natural bamboo combines with a flexible, yet highly durable outer edging of matte recycled PU plastics, making the Mauri iPhone Case the ultimate combination of luxurious quality, durable protection and unparalleled style.

We have ensured our Mauri range is strong enough to take on life’s adventure, whilst being a unique natural alternative, without adding unnecessary thickness.

The KOVERED Mauri Range Features- 

 • Form-fitting snap on style holder, with ultra-thin bamboo flip cover 
• Magnetic strip feature
 • Engineered to perfectly fit 
 • 100% Handcrafted in natural eco-friendly bamboo 
 • Ultra slim and lightweight 
 • Flip protection for complete cover

Naturally Different……. the natural grain of each case will differ slightly.

 You will also receive a FREE screen protector with this purchase, or you can choose to opt for the tempered glass addition for a small cost. 

 Postage in the UK is FREE. Express international postage is just £4.49.

name: KOVERED Bora Bamboo iPhone 5 Case
description:
The Bora Indian's knowledge of plant life and the surrounding rainforest maintains their livelihoods even today, trading natural rubber with small commercial organisations to protect their land.

The Bora Kovered iPhone Case is a mêlée between classic and contemporary. Blending the natural warmth of a sustainably sourced bamboo, with a protective, environmentally sympathetic outer-bevel of matte rubber PU, the Bora iPhone Case harmonises country charm and city excitement; readymade for the modern eco warrior. For style, distinction and unparalleled protection, look no further than the Bora.

The KOVERED Bora Range Features -

•	Form-fitting snap on style holder, with ultrathin bamboo wooden face
•	Engineered to securely fit

name: KOVERED Tempered Glass Screen Protector
description:
The KOVERED Tempered Glass range is a seamless and invisible protective layer between your favourite device and the perils of the outside world. Incredibly lightweight and super-slim, the tempered glass benefits from incredible strength and durability. 

The KOVERED tempered glass range offer premium protection compared with thin plastic alternatives whilst adding 0.03mm on top of your screen. 

The KOVERED Tempered Glass Range Features -
•	Just 0.03mm in Thickness
•	Highly Durable and Scratch Resistant
•	Three Times Stronger Than PET film. 
•	Scratch Resistant 
•	Provides Premium Protection to Life Bumps

For the best in discreet security, look no further than the KOVERED Tempered Glass iPhone Cover.

The KOVERED Tempered Glass range is compatible with ...

iPhone 4/4s      iPhone 5/5s     Samsung S4

All of our products are packaged in recyclable, toxin free cardboards. 

Please note we are not liable in the event of a breakage after delivery, we offer this product to be used at your own discretion. If in the unlikely event of a breakage, please handle with care, because whilst tempered glass is designed not to be sharp, we don’t want any accidents!

name: KOVERED Tasman iPhone 4/4s 5/5s  Mother of Pearl Case
description:
The Tasman Sea lies in the south pacific between Australia and New Zealand. Known for its deep trench, rich fishing grounds and abundance of sea life, it nurtures the Nacre or Mollusks species.

The KOVERED Tasman style combines a practical design, with a natural beauty of real Mother of Pearl. Boasting an iridescent magnificence, this unique and engaging design features a hand carved butterfly tapestry, adding individual style to the device of any gadgetry goddess. Crafted in part recycled plastic, the super-slim bevel ensures that your phone will be protected by the wisdom of the oceans, thanks to the natural phenomenon of the Tasman Mother of Pearl case.

The KOVERED Tasman Range Features - 

•Perfect fit for Apple iPhone 4/4s5/5s, (please select carefully)
•Crafted using real Mother of Pearl, giving a truly unique phone design for each case 
•Smooth and slim exterior allows access to all ports including, camera, headphones, speakers 
•Easy snap on and protective interior to protect your phone from dirt, bumps & scratches
• Glossy finish, made from part recycled thermoplastic polymer plastic

Naturally Different……. the natural Mother of Pearl of each case will differ slightly due to its authenticity, making each one truly unique!

We at KOVERED are also offering a FREE screen protector with this purchase to protect your phone when it needs it. 

UK postage is FREE. Express international postage is just £4.49.
